title: StainlessSteel Gas Barbeque with Four (£399) or Five (£440) Burners from BBQ Monkey (Save up to 60%)
highlights:
• Choice of two professional quality barbeques
  • Easy to clean 430 grade stainless steel designs

  • Four burner Barracuda with 64.5cm x 50cm cooking surface
  • Free rain cover included with each BBQ
